title: Somatic Experiencing
description: A fast breakdown of Somatic Experiencing for builders.

hook.text: Animals shake after a predator attack. Humans skip this step â€” and pay for it.

buildup.text: Peter Levine developed somatic experiencing to release trauma stored in the body.

discovery.text: The therapy tracks physical sensations to complete the survival responses trauma froze.

twist.text: Patients often feel their body trembling or releasing as stored energy finally moves.

climax.text: By finishing the body's interrupted response, the nervous system can finally reset.

punchline.text: The body holds the cure to the wound it carries.

quiz.question: What does somatic experiencing target?
options: Trauma stored in the body's physical sensations
